ProductInfo.Features:
Professional 8 Channel H.264 DVR with 6 x 1/3" SONY CCD Cameras, Vari-Focal Lens, 600 TV Lines.  iPhone support, Central Management System (CMS), Real Time Recording, Motion Detection Recording Function with Sensitivity Adjustment, USB Backup, PTZ Control
8 Channel H.264 DVR     Central Management System (CMS)     iPhone support     PTZ Control     Motion detection recording function with sensitivity adjustment     Manual/schedule/Motion Detection Recording Modes     Time & date search easy access     Live monitoring through internet from anywhere     USB backup     Easy navigation in OSD     VGA output to LCD Monitor for better resolution
GW705R :IR Waterproof Outdoor Camera that can be used in a variety of CCTV applications. High Performance and Outstanding Quality. 1/3" SONY CCD, Vari-Focal 4~9mm Lens, 600 TV Lines, 36PCs IR LED. Great for Outdoor Surveillance, Parking Lot, Entrance.
GW105H: Professional indoor dome camera, 1/3" SONY CCD, 560 TV lines, 36 IR LEDs, Vari-Focal 2.8~10mm Lens. Good for Indoor Usage. Super Low 0.001 Lux Minimum Illumination. Perfect For Your Business or Restaurant.
1/3" SONY CCD camera     560 TV lines     Super low lux 0.001 Lux minimum illumination     Wide angle lens
ProductInfo.Name: Complete 8 Channel CCTV Network DVR (500G HDD) Surveillance Video System Package with 1/3" Sony CCD (4) 560TVL Indoor & (2) 600TVL Outdoor Security Camera
